title: 247mining
author: 247mining
content: PUNKVERSE | MAD PUNKS | ZOMBIE | WAVES MARKETPLACEWhat is Punkverse?This place was created by the higher gods who love to drink. At one of our founder's parties (that's who we call the gods), they spilled their favorite beverage called CAPS. That's how the Punkverse was formed. A strange, inexplicable universe with different planets. We have been exploring the vastness of this world for half a year now. There are a lot of lifeless planets. But we managed to find 3 where Punks live! Hence the name.Our CollectionsIn total, we know of only three planets and a special guests without own planet:⚡ Crypto Chronicles - the first collection of digital Punks on Waves blockchain, dedicated both to the major milestones in cryptocurrency history.  Check it out on Waves Marketplace⚡ Zombie Punks - the second chapter of the Punkverse. This collection is dedicated to the world-famous zombie culture. The Punks have taken on an authentic look and will battle it out in a future Zombie Rush game.Mint them here⚡ Memaliens - the first free mint collection on Waves. They were the invaders of the Punkverse in the past. But with the help of our community, we were able to tame them. Who knows, maybe someday they'll get back on the warpath? Check it out on Waves Marketplace⚡ Mad Punks - A new planet we recently discovered. It's a post-apocalyptic world where Punks have to fight for survival and valuable resources. The once peaceful life has come to an end, and now the Punks have split into 3 warring factions and are fighting a bloody war for survival. MINT IS LIVE NOWWHY MAD PUNKS?> A favorite community item to add to your collection> A nice community where both newbies and OGs are welcomed> Integration into a game by the biggest project on Waves> Your easy access to Waves> A team of professionals

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: i don't have problem with NFT but is waves platform still alive? i mean, are there projects over this network that can survive long time? tbh, i don't know any project that is really successful using waves network. waves may be surviving but the project under this are not.

comments.author: spiker777
comments.body: Why specifically did you choose to Build on Waves  Blockchain? and you are probably right that it could be the first NFT on Waves because I haven't heard of any NFT project on Waves before.Quote from: AmoreJaz on September 09, 2022, 10:30:58 PMi don't have problem with NFT but is waves platform still alive? i mean, are there projects over this network that can survive long time? tbh, i don't know any project that is really successful using waves network. waves may be surviving but the project under this are not. Waves itself is Running but Tokens and projects made on it are mostly failed.

comments.author: jovan85
comments.body: Congratulations on first NFT on Waves. Have question about minting. If I understood correctly minting means going to the website, connecting the wallet and buying NFT on the marketplace? Minting is not free? Do you have bounty ?

comments.author: 247mining
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on September 09, 2022, 10:30:58 PMi don't have problem with NFT but is waves platform still alive? i mean, are there projects over this network that can survive long time? tbh, i don't know any project that is really successful using waves network. waves may be surviving but the project under this are not. Sure, Waves platform is alive as never before Here a lots of long-term projects, expecially related to NFTs. Waves Ducks, for example. It's official team product. Btw, Waves Punks collection is available on the market about a year for now. What's about Waves itself. According to their roadmap and Meta0 release, platform will solve some of the main issues of the blockchain.

comments.author: 247mining
comments.body: Quote from: spiker777 on September 10, 2022, 06:12:55 PMWhy specifically did you choose to Build on Waves  Blockchain? and you are probably right that it could be the first NFT on Waves because I haven't heard of any NFT project on Waves before.Why? The answer is simple: NFTs on Waves are gaining momentum and we could be pioneers on it. A wide field for the experiments. Low fees and fast blockchain. Own language for smartcontracts - Ride. And very friendly community, which is intrested in education and platform development.Waves Punks is the first collectable project on Waves. Here are some more examples of "old" NFTs, such as Waves Ducks, which concentrated on play-to-earn, and Sign Art marketplace

comments.author: 247mining
comments.body: Quote from: jovan85 on September 11, 2022, 08:50:06 PMCongratulations on first NFT on Waves. Have question about minting. If I understood correctly minting means going to the website, connecting the wallet and buying NFT on the marketplace? Minting is not free? Do you have bounty ?Thank you!Yeah, mint isn't free. The instruction for mint is here.Also, about a month ago we have an experiment with a free mint collection. It was a pretty funny and made a lot of noise on Waves platform. You can meet with this colletion on our Waves Marketplace.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on September 09, 2022, 10:30:58 PMi don't have problem with NFT but is waves platform still alive? i mean, are there projects over this network that can survive long time? tbh, i don't know any project that is really successful using waves network. waves may be surviving but the project under this are not. Waves is very much different now compared to five years ago I remember creating a token using their platform for $1 but now they are concentrating on what's trending right now, like NFT, I am also not aware of any token in their platform that reaches even the top 50 in the market, although they are still fast and cheap based on their stat, unfortunately, they lack the right marketing to keep this coin in the radar of investors.

comments.author: 247mining
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on September 17, 2022, 01:36:19 PMWaves is very much different now compared to five years ago I remember creating a token using their platform for $1 but now they are concentrating on what's trending right now, like NFT, I am also not aware of any token in their platform that reaches even the top 50 in the market, although they are still fast and cheap based on their stat, unfortunately, they lack the right marketing to keep this coin in the radar of investors.Token creation is still pretty cheap, about 1 Waves.USDN (stable on Waves) is on top 100, even after all problems with stables this spring.Official team do marketing, but also in NFTs and GameFi. For example, they participated in NFT.NYC and held events to present their AR game in Korea

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: 247mining on September 19, 2022, 11:10:31 AMQuote from: coin-investor on September 17, 2022, 01:36:19 PMWaves is very much different now compared to five years ago I remember creating a token using their platform for $1 but now they are concentrating on what's trending right now, like NFT, I am also not aware of any token in their platform that reaches even the top 50 in the market, although they are still fast and cheap based on their stat, unfortunately, they lack the right marketing to keep this coin in the radar of investors.Token creation is still pretty cheap, about 1 Waves.USDN (stable on Waves) is on top 100, even after all problems with stables this spring.Official team do marketing, but also in NFTs and GameFi. For example, they participated in NFT.NYC and held events to present their AR game in Koreaand this is what i am seeing as a challenge to your project. as most projects created under waves network couldn't find success, you have to think on how to market your project to attract interest from the crypto community. waves is surviving and maybe as you said, they are creating long-term projects. but very rare that you can hear a popular project connected with waves.when they transitioned to waves.exchange, i thought traders will go to their new exchange platform, but seems that not many traders are really using their exchange.

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on October 10, 2022, 06:49:49 PMand this is what i am seeing as a challenge to your project. as most projects created under waves network couldn't find success, you have to think on how to market your project to attract interest from the crypto community. waves is surviving and maybe as you said, they are creating long-term projects. but very rare that you can hear a popular project connected with waves.when they transitioned to waves.exchange, i thought traders will go to their new exchange platform, but seems that not many traders are really using their exchange.I believe that as the platform becomes more used, the projects/tokens/assets created on it will have greater visibility. The Waves platform is becoming consistent and relevant in the market, and using it is a good option.
